overview: Johnny gets pulled over for driving with an expired license. Bridgette is about to write him up, but Johnny has another idea in mind. Siri tries out for the cheerleading team but her massive tits keep getting in the way. Alan passes out from excitement of watching her bounce. Can Siri bring Alan back to life? Manuel hands in his report to Ava, but seeing how she's the boss, he has no say about anything. Unless he gives her a very big reason why.  Mr. Pete is taking Destiny's course and doesn't seem to get it. She thinks that Pete's mind is off somewhere else. She is about to fix that problem.
title: Big Tit Fantasies
